attributes.action: Pressure the car insurance companies to lower the cost of car insurance for younger drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Car insurance for younger drivers can go beyond the £3000 mark for car insurance,  by the cost being this high you are encouraging people to drive without insurance, if you look at the statistics you will see that recently there has been a increase in the number of cars impounded by the police due to the car driver having no insurance.

We believe this is wrong and believe that insurance should be based on an INDIVIDUAL not the age group as a whole. 

Therefore we are asking you (The Prime Minister) to Pressure the car insurance companies to lower the cost of car insurance for younger drivers and to base the cost on the insurance on the individual and stop this monopoly the insurance companies have on younger drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
